channel.title: NPC dialogue help

item.title: NPC dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Well, I’m using all-star source and I’m trying to finish off my NPC dialogue. I have two responding answers available, but you can only click the bottom one.
Here’s a pic

Here is my dialogue code below:

case 1339: // Hans sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Help, the forest has been over run by monsters and ghouls!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to view more info.", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

And

case 1340: sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("I'll help you get rid of these monsterous creatures!", 2461); sendFrame126("Once I'm through learning the aspects of Ragescape, I'll help.", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
